title: Will Work for Food
overview: Adam Gertler pairs his comedic timing with an adventurous spirit in this new series, Will Work for Food. The series exposes Adam to the world of little-known food jobs as he fearlessly puts his life and mouth on the line to try them all! Whether taking honey from three million bees, sculpting ice with a chain saw, foraging for truffles, or digging a wine cave, Adam will do anything in the name of food.
